name: DOWN THE RABBIT HOLE (itch) (Karl Fayeton)
description:
Global Game Jam 2022 : "Duality" DOWN THE RABBIT HOLE PITCH

Welcome inside the dream of a rabbit!

GOAL
  • Collect as much carrots as you can before the timer ends.
  • Shoot at the carrots to stun them so you can get closer.
  • Avoid owls. Owls eat rabbit for breakfast. You can shoot them, but be careful not to miss!
CONTROLS Gamepad strongly recommended!
  • Ⓛ (Left Joystick)  = Move
  • Ⓡ (Right Joystick) = Shoot
Keyboard
  • WASD = Move
  • ↑↓←→ = Shoot
CREDITS

Karl FAYETON Game Design, Game Code, FX

Antoine LECLERE 3D Modeling, Texturing

Matthieu RAUBER Sound Design

Léna STEIN 2D Art
